import*as d3 from'd3';export function drawAverageAreaChart(height,width){// set the dimensions and margins of the graph
var margin={top:30,right:30,bottom:70,left:60},width=460-margin.left-margin.right,height=400-margin.top-margin.bottom;// append the svg object to the body of the page
var svg=d3.select("#averagearea").append("svg").attr("width",width+margin.left+margin.right).attr("height",height+margin.top+margin.bottom).append("g").attr("transform","translate("+margin.left+","+margin.top+")");// Parse the Data
var myData=d3.csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/carlincherry/dsci554projectdata/main/TumorArea.csv");myData.then(function(data){// X axis
var x=d3.scaleBand().range([0,width]).domain(data.map(function(d){return d.stage;})).padding(0.2);svg.append("g").attr("transform","translate(0,"+height+")").call(d3.axisBottom(x)).selectAll("text").attr("transform","translate(-10,0)rotate(-45)").style("text-anchor","end");// Add Y axis
var y=d3.scaleLinear().domain([0,2000]).range([height,0]);svg.append("g").call(d3.axisLeft(y));// Bars
svg.selectAll("mybar").data(data).enter().append("rect").attr("x",function(d){return x(d.stage);}).attr("y",function(d){return y(d.area);}).attr("width",x.bandwidth()).attr("height",function(d){return height-y(d.area);}).attr("fill",'#28a745').on("mouseover",function(){d3.select(this).style("fill",'#005A32').style('fill-opacity',1);}).on("mouseout",function(){d3.select(this).style("fill",'#28a745').style('fill-opacity',1);});});}
